welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Nicolas de los Garza
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Nicolas de los Garza, a vibrant city known for its rich culture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our charming streets, savor our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.
